title.narrative: Cracking the Nut 2019

description.narrative: An inclusive and competitive cashew sector in Benin and Burkina Faso, in which smallholder farmers, processors and service providers are enabled to increase productivity and efficiency in a collaborative way generating increased revenues/profits for at least 10,000 farmers and generating increased disposable income for 2,500 workers in the cashew-processing industry
